mapper.insert: insert into tb_carport(carport_no, org_id, status, apartment_id, datetime) values(#{carport_no}, #{org_id}, #{status}, #{apartment_id}, #{datetime})
mapper.select: select * from tb_carport where 1=1 and status=1
select * from tb_carport where 1=1 and carport_no=#{carport_no}
select * from tb_carport where 1=1 and org_id=#{org_id}
select * from tb_carport where 1=1 and apartment_id=#{apartment_id}
select * from tb_carport where 1=1 and apartment_id=#{apartment_id} and datetime like CONCAT('%','${datetime}','%') and status=1
mapper.update: update tb_carport set status=1 where carport_id=#{carport_id}
update tb_carport set status=0 where carport_id=#{carport_id}
